dcterms:creator: S. Bhagat
G. Cormode
S. Muthukrishnan
dcterms:description: Cora is a citation network of machine learning papers. The labels of vertices indicate the topic of the paper. Each paper has a single topic. The dataset is converted to an undirected graph using only link information.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: H. Cai
V. W. Zheng
K. C.-C. Chang
dcterms:description: Wiki is a network with vertices as web pages from 19 classes. Each page has a single label. The links among different vertices are hyperlinks on the web page, converted to an undirected graph using only link information.
dcterms:title: Wiki

dcterms:creator: G. R. Lopes
M. M. Moro
L. K. Wives
J. P. M. De Oliveira
dcterms:description: DBLP is a network of co-authorship of researchers in computer science. The labels represent the research areas in which a researcher publishes. A researcher may have more than one research area.
dcterms:title: DBLP

dcterms:creator: P. Goyal
E. Ferrara
dcterms:description: BlogCatalog is a social network of users as bloggers on the BlogCatalog website. The links show the relationships between users, and the labels represent the categories that bloggers have interest in.
dcterms:title: BlogCatalog
